name: Fishing for Your Roots
description:
Description:

You play as a salmon trying to avoid the angers of returning back to your spawning grounds. See if you are strong enough to make it back and rejoice with the others!

Credits:

Programmer - Jackson Vanderheyden

Sound Design - Amanda Hauser

Art Design - Hannah Berg

Controls:

W - Move up

A - Move back

S - Move down

D - Move forward

Space - Jump
